fullplot: In a small Southern American town, Paul, who is known for having sexual relations with every girl in town, falls in love with his best friend's younger sister who is a virgin. Paul must try to prove to everyone that this time he is in love rather than in lust.
plot: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.
title: All the Real Girls

tomatoes.consensus: Has enough honest moments to warrant a look.
